resources.string: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
The app needs permissions to create images and photos, so you can create shares for Insta, Face and Twitter. Accept the requested permissions, otherwise can not take pictures.
The app needs permission to access the camera for you to take photos. Without this permission, you can not take pictures!
Permission not granted, it will not be possible to take photos.
Permission not granted, it will not be possible to share photos without this permission.
